content:
Both Adagio Teas and The Tea Spot offer promotions and discounts for new customers. Here are some deals you can take advantage of:

**Adagio Teas**:

* **New Customer Discount**: 10% off your first order with code WELCOME10
* **Free Shipping**: On orders over $49 (continental US only)
* **Tea of the Month Club**: Get 20% off your first month's subscription with code TEA20
* **Refer a Friend**: Refer friends and get 20% off your next order when they make a purchase

**The Tea Spot**:

* **New Customer Discount**: 15% off your first order with code TEA15
* **Free Shipping**: On orders over $50 (continental US only)
* **Tea of the Month Club**: Get 15% off your first month's subscription with code TEA15
* **Sign-up Bonus**: Get a free tea sample with your first order when you sign up for their newsletter

Please note that promotions and discounts are subject to change, so it's always a good idea to check their websites or social media pages for the latest offers.

Additionally, both Adagio Teas and The Tea Spot offer rewards programs and loyalty points for repeat customers, so be sure to sign up for those to earn points and redeem rewards.

Happy shopping, and I hope you enjoy your tea adventures with these companies!
